comment:
REVIEW FINDINGS - CR-016 v0.1

FRONTMATTER VERIFICATION:
- title: 'SOP and Template Cross-Validation Alignment' - VERIFIED PRESENT
- revision_summary: 'Initial draft' - VERIFIED PRESENT (no CR ID required for v0.1)

STRUCTURE: Document follows executable document structure with all required sections.

PLACEHOLDER CHECK: No prohibited placeholders (TBD, TODO, FIXME, XXX) found.

TECHNICAL CLAIMS VERIFIED:
1. ER-TEMPLATE Section 5 contains 'Proposed Corrective Action' (line 103) but SOP-004 Section 9.2 does not list it - CONFIRMED
2. No INV-TEMPLATE exists - CONFIRMED (glob search returned no files)

DEFICIENCY IDENTIFIED:
Section 2.2 states 'This CR implements five coordinated changes' but only enumerates three numbered items:
  1. SOP-002 / CR-TEMPLATE
  2. SOP-004
  3. SOP-003 / INV-TEMPLATE

This is an internal inconsistency. Either correct the count to 'three' or add the missing two items.

TU ASSIGNMENT: No Technical Units required. This CR modifies procedural/QMS documents only (SOPs and templates). TUs are domain experts for code (UI, Scene, Sketch, Sim) - none of those domains are affected.

DECISION: REQUEST UPDATES - Correct the count discrepancy in Section 2.2 before re-routing for review.

CR-016 v0.1 COMPLIANT. Verified: (1) Frontmatter title field present: 'SOP and Template Cross-Validation Alignment'; (2) revision_summary present: 'Initial draft' (acceptable for v0.1); (3) Section 2.2 correctly states 'three coordinated changes' matching the three enumerated items; (4) All required CR sections present per SOP-002; (5) No prohibited placeholder content (TBD/TODO/FIXME/XXX); (6) Formatting consistent; (7) No typos or errors. Document may proceed to pre-approval.
